name: Shadow Step (itch)
description:
This game was made for the GeoJam (https://itch.io/jam/geojam).

---------------------------------------

In this puzzle platformer you need to get your shadow and you to the right door. 

I tried my best making some decent puzzle levels, but I found it much harder than I anticipated.

---------------------------------------

The music was made before the jam.

Song is called "Friends" and is made by Josh McKay.
